dialogue.text: And the blue team won again!
Wh... why we lost? We had true friendship by our side!
Friendship? What do you mean?
The 'tech' you stolen from our fort is... just the way we respect each other...
You... red Nerd... aren't you... dominating the other units?! Are you friends?!
Exactly. Sometime we go dancing, play RPGs and excercise together. We meet at the bar every morning.
It's... impossible. Girls don't like nerds... Nerds don't like Machos... and...
Mr. General. 'Red Nerd' is my boyfriend.
Oh. That's... too much. How... you managed to...
Hey, glass guy. That's nothing new. We ARE friends. We love your water battles...
...because we've a lot of fun! We are happy when we're with you!
It's... not... for my military skills...
Aw, come on! Your military skills are pretty amazing! But it's just one part of you!
Aw. I. I got it. You, guys...
Yes! They are battling with you because they are your friends, not your units!
... So. I have... different friends. Now. It's... it's...
Aw, General. Come on. Let's go all together to the bar for a beer!
Outstanding idea, Blue Bro! We've to celebrate the end of the Royal Water Battles!
Let's march to the bar! One-two-three-four! One-two-three-four!
Right! Well, as the General... I propose here and now an eternal peace treaty between Red and Blue!
Red Team agrees! And we need a cool name for this. Something that will be remembered!
I've that too. The 'Water Seal' will bond us all together for this summer and forever!
AWWW YEEEAH!
AND THE GENERAL WILL OFFER FOR US ALL!
LET'S GO!
H-HEY! IT'S NOT FAIR! HEY GUYS... COME BACK!
'Stop!' 'Catch me, soldier!' 'Take this!' *SPLASH* 'Hey! The war is over, General!' 'It's... training!'
Kh. Kh. Kh. Kh. Kh.
Now that the General and its team is with us, we will bring down the world...
...under the sacred 'Water Seal'. The war will never end, my beloved friends.
